Name: Mahjong Business Style
About the game: Become a business shark – play Mahjong on the exchange! Complete more than 100 levels, earning points and countless trophies. Climb the ladder of success and Wall Street will bow to you! Each pack embodies a separate market – from stocks to advanced technologies. The setup of each level contains a certain amount of gold pieces, which earn the player far more points than regular pieces. This adds variety to the game format and playing process. The levels are balanced by difficulty: there are classic levels and setups with wandering pieces, in which the arrangement of the the tokens changes with each new attempt.
